post.description: Reset user password using a valid token received via email. Token can only be used once.
Send a password reset link to the user's email address. Returns success message regardless of whether email exists (to prevent email enumeration attacks).

message.example: If that email address is in our system, we have emailed a password reset link.

status.description: Password reset status (only when email exists)

post.description: Creates a new user account with email verification

message.example: User registered successfully. Please check your email to verify your account.

verification_required.description: Indicates if email verification is required

login_enabled.description: Indicates if login is enabled before verification

verification_expires_at.description: Expiration time of the verification link
